original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1086)@</color>在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4862)@</color> 秒內縮短我方全體武將 <color=#ccffcc>45%</color> 技能回復時間，並延長全體敵方武將 <color=#ccffcc>45%</color> 技能回復時間。
text: <color=#FFE787> Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1086)@</color> within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4862)@</color> seconds Shorten the <color=#ccffcc>45%</color> skill response time of all our generals, and extend the <color=#ccffcc>45%</color> skill response time of all enemy generals.
